column2: Aparthotel Adagio Access Bruxelles Europe Aparthotel
column3:
Great location (15 minutes to Central station and Grand Place via park). 
Friendly staff.  
The room is big, clean.
Small kitchen in the room, it's very comfortable.

column2: Aparthotel Adagio Access Bruxelles Europe Aparthotel
column3: Very good location, very helpful staff and welcoming snacks were perfect :)

column2: Aparthotel Adagio Access Bruxelles Europe Aparthotel
column3: The stafd vere nice and helpful, the bed was good, clean bathroom.
column4: The booking.com photos show a beautiful new facility, while I was gratly dissapointed to see a dirty carpet flooring with ugly wall platering and a very small "apartment" with the bed immediately next to the kitchen sink and microwave, all at 595$ for the five night stay! I have never been more "conned" into a high priced stay, and we had to pay immediately, even before we saw the rooms. To change your towels you had to add 2.5$ like this was not enough. And the location was not in the center or the EU district but three metro stations either way. Very dissapointed, would never recommend this as opposed to many other beautiful places in Brussels for the same price!

column2: Aparthotel Adagio Access Bruxelles Europe Aparthotel
column3: Bed was really comfortable and I asked for a quiet room the staff were really obliging and looked after me. I had a great sleep.

column2: Aparthotel Adagio Access Bruxelles Europe Aparthotel
column3: Great hotel, fantastic, friendly and helpful staff! Breakfast was also really nice. I will come back for sure.

column2: Aparthotel Adagio Access Bruxelles Europe Aparthotel
column3: I especially liked the staff! I would say they were the highlight of the stay.
column4: I think it may be a little overpriced. 10$ for the breakfast provided was a bit steep. For a two star hotel, 130$ is a bit overpriced. But I understand Belgium is an expensive place so I understand. I would still stay there if I got to come back.

column2: Aparthotel Adagio Access Bruxelles Europe Aparthotel
column3: Great receptionists, near everything.  So yes 5 for this hotel
